record.description: Crawling as it should be done-close to the ground, one leg propelling the body, head lowered so it won't show white against the background. Men are, left, SSgt's. L.W. Peters, De la Salle High School instructor, and right, foreground, G.T. Rose, 6346 Kenwood, plant superintendent; in the background, Corp. W.M. Schmitz, 2703 N. Racine, insurance broker.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
